item.title: My Vim Learning Diary 2
item.description: Vim Motion / Vim Keybinding Here I will keep a note of some of the vim motion & keybinding I found useful: Copy current line and paste the line below 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 yyp # yy: yank current line into default register # p: paste the default register into the next line (the line below current cursor) Vyp # V: enter visual line mode # y: yank the current selected line (by default you will be selecting the current line) # p: paste the default register into the next line (the line below current cursor) Reference Vim Motions Guide (2022) - Vim Salesman
